message: We won't spam your wall or anything like that
Just a quick tip, if you connect twitter/facebook, we can suggest groups to join that your friends are in.
We just want to make sure you find the best groups
@kin For Twitter we don't really mind the other direction (who follows you)
if i connect through twitter, how do you determine friend from stranger? do you just grab all followers?
@kin We show you groups of all the people you follow
@sucuri We want to make sure if Twitter or Facebook are down, that you're still able to log in, and also if you ever disconnect those accounts, you'll still be able to log in too.
why does it needs an extra pass after authenticating using twitter?
make sense :) just one extra pass to remember lol
Can you guys explain why you want facebook offline access?
